tool_description: Analyzes sentiment of review text using natural language processing to classify reviews as positive, negative, or neutral with confidence scores.

review_ids.description: List of review IDs to analyze for sentiment

sentiment_model.description: Sentiment analysis model to use: basic, advanced, domain_specific

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for sentiment classification (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Empty review list: review_ids array cannot be empty
Invalid model type: Use one of [basic, advanced, domain_specific]
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Text processing error: One or more reviews contain unprocessable text
Batch size exceeded: Maximum 10,000 reviews can be processed at once
usage: Provide review IDs to analyze, optionally specify the sentiment model and confidence threshold. Returns sentiment classifications and confidence scores for each review.

review_sentiments.description: Sentiment classification for each review (positive, negative, neutral)

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores corresponding to each sentiment classification

sentiment_distribution.description: Overall distribution summary of sentiment classifications

average_confidence.description: Average confidence score across all analyzed reviews
